name: Travel Jeans
short_description: Colorful denim with stretch & a natural resistance to wrinkles.
description: When you're traveling, bag space is at a premium. Which means you need a pair of pants that can handle anything. That's precisely why we created Travel Jeans. They have a hint of stretch for comfort, they're naturally resistant to wrinkles, and they can do pretty much anything chinos can. But, yes, they are still jeans for all those denim lovers out there.

name: The Blue Jean
short_description: Perfectly broken-in with a hint of stretch. Made for everyday wear.
description: We all have that favorite pair of jeans. That treasured, perfectly broken-in pair of denim that we wear a little more than we should. And that's exactly what we set out to recreate. Made from premium denim with a curved waistband and a hint of comfortable stretch, these aren't just a pair of blue jeans. They're THE Blue Jean, and once you put them on, you won't want to take them off anytime soon.

name: Classic Pique Polo
short_description: Your everyday polo made from soft Peruvian piqué cotton.
description: A rule to live by: when the weather gets warm, a drawer of classic polo shirts is an absolute necessity. They go with everything (think chinos, denim, even a sport coat) and they're designed to be breathable and cool. Our Classic Piqué Polo is made from some of the softest piqué cotton around, and it comes in every color you need.

name: Capstone Italian Wool Tuxedo Jacket
description: There's something to be said for a simple, classic suit. But there's something to be celebrated in a sartorial masterpiece. Crafted exclusively from the finest fabrics in the world, the Capstone is the pinnacle of the Bonobos tailored line, a showpiece suit designed for the connoisseur. Great structures—and great wardrobes—start with a strong foundation. But when you arrive at the summit, the Capstone brings everything together and makes it complete.

name: Stretch Washed Chinos
short_description: Our bestselling, better-fitting chinos with 2% stretch for comfort.
description: Our bestselling, better-fitting chinos with 2% stretch for comfort.

name: Jetsetter Stretch Wool Suit Jacket
description: What happens when first-class comfort meets a world-class fit? Something incredible. Something we like to call "The Jetsetter." It's a versatile four-season wool suit with a hint of stretch, and a signature passport pocket inside the jacket. It will keep its razor-sharp silhouette whenever you need it, and bounce back from whatever comes your way. At this price, it is an ideal "first suit" for those just starting out, but it's equally appropriate for the experienced sartorialist. Whether it's a long flight overseas, or simply a busy week at the office, the Jetsetter will always stay in top form. Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose suit that can recover and perform after just about anything.

short_description: A lighter stretch denim for warmer climates.

name: Tuxedo Shirt
short_description: Luxe Italian fabric. Impeccable details. Cut to an elegant fit.
description: We've always felt that you shouldn't have to go to a tailor for a great dress shirt, and for us, the Americano is proof. The most luxurious dress shirt we offer, it starts with premium cotton fabric from one of Italy's most celebrated mills. We cut and stitch the cloth to a crisp, elegant fit, and finish it with mother-of-pearl-buttons, double knife pleats, and a split-back yoke. The Americano will pair wonderfully with your favorite suit and tie, but it can go just as well with a great pair of selvage denim or chinos.

name: Daily Grind Wrinkle Free Dress Shirt
short_description: Soft, tailored cotton resistant to wrinkles & machine washable.
description: Dressing for work isn't rocket science. It's really about looking your best without spending a ton of time doing so. Which is why the Daily Grinds come in so handy. Simply stated, these dress shirts are crafted and tailored never to wrinkle. Utilizing wrinkle-free technology, they can be washed and worn with minimal ironing, and they will maintain their rich color and crisp appearance. You won’t just be looking great and worrying less, you’ll be saving time, money, and energy over the long life of your Daily Grind shirts. And did we mention looking great? Oh. We did.

short_description: The shorts version of our original better-fitting chinos.

They're great for vacations, superb for barbecues and ball games, and they do beach weekends like you wouldn't believe.

name: Capstone Italian Wool Tuxedo Pant
description: There's something to be said for a simple, classic suit. But there's something to be celebrated in a sartorial masterpiece. Crafted exclusively from the finest fabrics in the world, the Capstone is the pinnacle of the Bonobos tailored line, a showpiece suit designed for the connoisseur. Great structures—and great wardrobes—start with a strong foundation. But when you arrive at the summit, the Capstone brings everything together and makes it complete.

name: Washed Chinos
short_description: Our original better-fitting chinos in a range of colors.
description: The pants Bonobos was built on, we designed these chinos to fit great and to do it all. Their curved waistband conforms to the natural shape of your waist, and their trimmer cut makes for a more flattering silhouette. You can dress them up, you can dress them down, and damn, do they come in some amazing colors.

name: Foundation Italian Wool Suit Jacket
description: Finding a classic, expertly-made suit is tough—we know, we've been there. Which is exactly why we decided to make our Foundation suit. Crafted form world-class fabrics, and available in two impeccable fits, it is that dependable, great-fitting suit you can go back to again and again, whether it's for work, for play, or some stylish combination of the two. And don't be afraid to use the jacket and pants as separates—we do it all the time.

name: Weekday Warrior Dress Pants
short_description: Wrinkle-resistant, easy-care cotton that simplifies your work day.
description: Let's be honest about this: nobody likes getting dressed for work. Picking out the pants, the unwelcome wrinkles, the clumsy ironing board—who needs it? Certainly not us. The solution, we would posit, is the Weekday Warriors. Made from non-iron fabric, available in a range of office-friendly colors, these great-fitting, hassle-free cotton dress pants take the pain out of workdays. So relax. Enjoy that coffee. Savor that sports page. And say goodbye to ironing forever.

name: Classic Pique Polo
short_description: Your everyday polo made from soft Peruvian piqué cotton.
description: A rule to live by: when the weather gets warm, a drawer of classic polo shirts is an absolute necessity. They go with everything (think chinos, denim, even a sport coat) and they're designed to be breathable and cool. Our Classic Piqué Polo is made from some of the softest piqué cotton around, and it comes in every color you need.

description: We all have that favorite pair of jeans. That treasured, perfectly broken-in pair of denim that we wear a little more than we should. And that's exactly what we set out to recreate. Made from premium denim with a curved waistband and a hint of comfortable stretch, these aren't just a pair of blue jeans. They're THE Blue Jean, and once you put them on, you won't want to take them off anytime soon.

name: Unconstructed Italian Wool Blazer
description: Head to a piazza in any major Italian city, and you’re likely to encounter “sprezzatura,” the art of effortless style. That same sense of casual elegance was the inspiration behind this season’s unconstructed blazers. Crafted from Italian fabrics, and featuring a more relaxed, “unconstructed” design, they’re the type of blazers you can throw on over anything for an instant dose of casual cool – which, we’ve been told, goes perfectly with a shot of espresso.

name: Foundation Italian Wool Suit Pants
short_description: 100% Italian Marzotto wool in an all-season weight.
description: Finding a classic, expertly-made suit is tough—we know, we've been there. Which is exactly why we decided to make our Foundation suit. Crafted from world-class fabrics, and available in two impeccable fits, it is that dependable, great-fitting suit you can go back to again and again, whether it's for work, for play, or some stylish combination of the two. And don't be afraid to use the jacket and pants as separates—we do it all the time.

name: Jetsetter Stretch Wool Suit Jacket
description: What happens when first-class comfort meets a world-class fit? Something incredible. Something we like to call "The Jetsetter." It's a versatile four-season wool suit with a hint of stretch, and a signature passport pocket inside the jacket. It will keep its razor-sharp silhouette whenever you need it, and bounce back from whatever comes your way. At this price, it is an ideal "first suit" for those just starting out, but it's equally appropriate for the experienced sartorialist. Whether it's a long flight overseas, or simply a busy week at the office, the Jetsetter will always stay in top form. Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose suit that can recover and perform after just about anything.

name: Summer Weight Jeans
short_description: A lighter stretch denim for warmer climates.
description: With its casual look and broken-in feel, denim has always been an old favorite. But it can be a little heavy for warmer weather. So what's the solution? Summer Weight Jeans. Everything you love about denim in a lighter weight to keep you cool.

name: Weekday Warrior Dress Pants
short_description: Wrinkle-resistant, easy-care cotton that simplifies your work day.
description: Let's be honest about this: nobody likes getting dressed for work. Picking out the pants, the unwelcome wrinkles, the clumsy ironing board—who needs it? Certainly not us. The solution, we would posit, is the Weekday Warriors. Made from non-iron fabric, available in a range of office-friendly colors, these great-fitting, hassle-free cotton dress pants take the pain out of workdays. So relax. Enjoy that coffee. Savor that sports page. And say goodbye to ironing forever.

name: Daily Grind Wrinkle Free Dress Shirt
short_description: Soft, tailored cotton resistant to wrinkles & machine washable.
description: Dressing for work isn't rocket science. It's really about looking your best without spending a ton of time doing so. Which is why the Daily Grinds come in so handy. Simply stated, these dress shirts are crafted and tailored never to wrinkle. Utilizing wrinkle-free technology, they can be washed and worn with minimal ironing, and they will maintain their rich color and crisp appearance. You won’t just be looking great and worrying less, you’ll be saving time, money, and energy over the long life of your Daily Grind shirts. And did we mention looking great? Oh. We did.

name: Cotton Cashmere Half-Zip Sweater
short_description: Luxurious & breathable. A transitional, sophisticated pullover.
description: We're always on the lookout for that perfect transitional sweater to throw on when the weather gets cooler, and this just might be it. Cotton is famous for its softness and comfort. Cashmere is legendary for its luxurious hand-feel and warmth. And our Cotton Cashmere knits combine the very best of both. These are all-purpose garments that make seasonal layering easy. Weekends on the town, beachside getaways, long vacations to foreign locales – Bonobos Cotton Cashmere is the simple way to cover warmth and style.

name: Summer Weight Chinos
short_description: The lightest version of our signature chinos. Cool, breathable cotton.
description: Cool, crisp, and breathable in the heat, the Summer Weight Chinos bring a lighter fabric weight to your favorite class of pant. They can do everything our great-fitting Washed Chinos can do, but they do it . . . well, a little bit cooler. From May picnics to July barbecues to hot August nights at rooftop parties, these are the chinos you can wear starting the first sunny days of spring, right on through until Indian summer. Yep. Pretty cool.

name: Washed Chinos
short_description: Our original better-fitting chinos in a range of colors.
description: The pants Bonobos was built on, we designed these chinos to fit great and to do it all. Their curved waistband conforms to the natural shape of your waist, and their trimmer cut makes for a more flattering silhouette. You can dress them up, you can dress them down, and damn, do they come in some amazing colors.

name: Classic Pique Polo
short_description: Your everyday polo made from soft Peruvian piqué cotton.
description: A rule to live by: when the weather gets warm, a drawer of classic polo shirts is an absolute necessity. They go with everything (think chinos, denim, even a sport coat) and they're designed to be breathable and cool. Our Classic Piqué Polo is made from some of the softest piqué cotton around, and it comes in every color you need.

name: Summer Weight Shorts
short_description: The lightest version of our signature chino shorts.
description: Shorts are already missing their bottom half. How do you make them even more wearable in warm weather? On our end, we sourced some of the lightest, most comfortable cotton we could find. Wearing these lightweight wonders is the next best thing to wearing nothing at... well, let's just say they're really comfortable in the heat. They're great for vacations, superb for barbecues and ball games, and they do beach weekends like you wouldn't believe.

It's a versatile four-season wool suit with a hint of stretch, and a signature passport pocket inside the jacket. It will keep its razor-sharp silhouette whenever you need it, and bounce back from whatever comes your way. At this price, it is an ideal "first suit" for those just starting out, but it's equally appropriate for the experienced sartorialist. Whether it's a long flight overseas, or simply a busy week at the office, the Jetsetter will always stay in top form. Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose suit that can recover and perform after just about anything.

name: Summer Weight Jeans
short_description: A lighter stretch denim for warmer climates.
description: With its casual look and broken-in feel, denim has always been an old favorite. But it can be a little heavy for warmer weather. So what's the solution? Summer Weight Jeans. Everything you love about denim in a lighter weight to keep you cool.

name: Daily Grind Wrinkle Free Dress Shirt
short_description: Soft, tailored cotton resistant to wrinkles & machine washable.
description: Dressing for work isn't rocket science. It's really about looking your best without spending a ton of time doing so. Which is why the Daily Grinds come in so handy. Simply stated, these dress shirts are crafted and tailored never to wrinkle. Utilizing wrinkle-free technology, they can be washed and worn with minimal ironing, and they will maintain their rich color and crisp appearance. You won’t just be looking great and worrying less, you’ll be saving time, money, and energy over the long life of your Daily Grind shirts. And did we mention looking great? Oh. We did.

description: Finding a classic, expertly-made suit is tough—we know, we've been there. Which is exactly why we decided to make our Foundation suit. And don't be afraid to use the jacket and pants as separates—we do it all the time.

name: Classic Pique Polo
short_description: Your everyday polo made from soft Peruvian piqué cotton.
description: A rule to live by: when the weather gets warm, a drawer of classic polo shirts is an absolute necessity. They go with everything (think chinos, denim, even a sport coat) and they're designed to be breathable and cool. Our Classic Piqué Polo is made from some of the softest piqué cotton around, and it comes in every color you need.

name: Tuxedo Shirt
short_description: Luxe Italian fabric. Impeccable details. Cut to an elegant fit.
description: We've always felt that you shouldn't have to go to a tailor for a great dress shirt, and for us, the Americano is proof. The most luxurious dress shirt we offer, it starts with premium cotton fabric from one of Italy's most celebrated mills. We cut and stitch the cloth to a crisp, elegant fit, and finish it with mother-of-pearl-buttons, double knife pleats, and a split-back yoke. The Americano will pair wonderfully with your favorite suit and tie, but it can go just as well with a great pair of selvage denim or chinos.

description: There's something to be said for a simple, classic suit. But there's something to be celebrated in a sartorial masterpiece. Great structures—and great wardrobes—start with a strong foundation. But when you arrive at the summit, the Capstone brings everything together and makes it complete.

description: Cool, crisp, and breathable in the heat, the Summer Weight Chinos bring a lighter fabric weight to your favorite class of pant. They can do everything our great-fitting Washed Chinos can do, but they do it . . . well, a little bit cooler. From May picnics to July barbecues to hot August nights at rooftop parties, these are the chinos you can wear starting the first sunny days of spring, right on through until Indian summer. Yep. Pretty cool.

name: Summer Weight Jeans
short_description: A lighter stretch denim for warmer climates.
description: With its casual look and broken-in feel, denim has always been an old favorite. But it can be a little heavy for warmer weather. So what's the solution? Summer Weight Jeans. Everything you love about denim in a lighter weight to keep you cool.

name: Daily Grind Wrinkle Free Dress Shirt
short_description: Soft, tailored cotton resistant to wrinkles & machine washable.
description: Dressing for work isn't rocket science. It's really about looking your best without spending a ton of time doing so. Which is why the Daily Grinds come in so handy. Simply stated, these dress shirts are crafted and tailored never to wrinkle. Utilizing wrinkle-free technology, they can be washed and worn with minimal ironing, and they will maintain their rich color and crisp appearance. You won’t just be looking great and worrying less, you’ll be saving time, money, and energy over the long life of your Daily Grind shirts. And did we mention looking great? Oh. We did.

name: Travel Jeans
short_description: Colorful denim with stretch & a natural resistance to wrinkles.
description: When you're traveling, bag space is at a premium. Which means you need a pair of pants that can handle anything. That's precisely why we created Travel Jeans. They have a hint of stretch for comfort, they're naturally resistant to wrinkles, and they can do pretty much anything chinos can. But, yes, they are still jeans for all those denim lovers out there.

name: The Blue Jean
short_description: Perfectly broken-in with a hint of stretch. Made for everyday wear.
description: We all have that favorite pair of jeans. That treasured, perfectly broken-in pair of denim that we wear a little more than we should. And that's exactly what we set out to recreate. Made from premium denim with a curved waistband and a hint of comfortable stretch, these aren't just a pair of blue jeans. They're THE Blue Jean, and once you put them on, you won't want to take them off anytime soon.

name: Unconstructed Italian Wool Blazer
description: Head to a piazza in any major Italian city, and you’re likely to encounter “sprezzatura,” the art of effortless style. That same sense of casual elegance was the inspiration behind this season’s unconstructed blazers. Crafted from Italian fabrics, and featuring a more relaxed, “unconstructed” design, they’re the type of blazers you can throw on over anything for an instant dose of casual cool – which, we’ve been told, goes perfectly with a shot of espresso.

name: Stretch Wool Dress Pants
short_description: Versatile four-season wool pants with a hint of stretch.
description: What happens when first-class comfort meets a world-class fit? Something incredible. These versatile four-season wool pants have a hint of stretch for comfort while you move, and they're designed to bounce back from whatever comes your way. Whether it's a long flight overseas, or simply a busy week at the office, the Stretch Wool Dress Pant will always stay in top form. Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose dress pant that can recover and perform after just about anything.

name: Weekday Warrior Dress Pants
short_description: Wrinkle-resistant, easy-care cotton that simplifies your work day.
description: Let's be honest about this: nobody likes getting dressed for work. Picking out the pants, the unwelcome wrinkles, the clumsy ironing board—who needs it? Certainly not us. The solution, we would posit, is the Weekday Warriors. Made from non-iron fabric, available in a range of office-friendly colors, these great-fitting, hassle-free cotton dress pants take the pain out of workdays. So relax. Enjoy that coffee. Savor that sports page. And say goodbye to ironing forever.

name: Classic Pique Polo
short_description: Your everyday polo made from soft Peruvian piqué cotton.
description: A rule to live by: when the weather gets warm, a drawer of classic polo shirts is an absolute necessity. They go with everything (think chinos, denim, even a sport coat) and they're designed to be breathable and cool. Our Classic Piqué Polo is made from some of the softest piqué cotton around, and it comes in every color you need.

name: Capstone Italian Wool Suit Jacket
description: There's something to be said for a simple, classic suit. But there's something to be celebrated in a sartorial masterpiece. Crafted exclusively from the finest fabrics in the world, the Capstone is the pinnacle of the Bonobos tailored line, a showpiece suit designed for the connoisseur. Great structures—and great wardrobes—start with a strong foundation. But when you arrive at the summit, the Capstone brings everything together and makes it complete.

name: Foundation Chambray Suit Jacket
description: Finding a classic, expertly-made suit is tough—we know, we've been there. Which is exactly why we decided to make our Foundation suit. Crafted from world-class fabrics, and available in two impeccable fits, it is that dependable, great-fitting suit you can go back to again and again, whether it's for work, for play, or some stylish combination of the two. And don't be afraid to use the jacket and pants as separates—we do it all the time.

name: Jetsetter Stretch Wool Suit Jacket
description: What happens when first-class comfort meets a world-class fit? Something incredible. Something we like to call "The Jetsetter." It's a versatile four-season wool suit with a hint of stretch, and a signature passport pocket inside the jacket. It will keep its razor-sharp silhouette whenever you need it, and bounce back from whatever comes your way. At this price, it is an ideal "first suit" for those just starting out, but it's equally appropriate for the experienced sartorialist. Whether it's a long flight overseas, or simply a busy week at the office, the Jetsetter will always stay in top form. Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose suit that can recover and perform after just about anything.

name: Tuxedo Shirt
short_description: Luxe Italian fabric. Impeccable details. Cut to an elegant fit.
description: We've always felt that you shouldn't have to go to a tailor for a great dress shirt, and for us, the Americano is proof. The most luxurious dress shirt we offer, it starts with premium cotton fabric from one of Italy's most celebrated mills. We cut and stitch the cloth to a crisp, elegant fit, and finish it with mother-of-pearl-buttons, double knife pleats, and a split-back yoke. The Americano will pair wonderfully with your favorite suit and tie, but it can go just as well with a great pair of selvage denim or chinos.

Utilizing wrinkle-free technology, they can be washed and worn with minimal ironing, and they will maintain their rich color and crisp appearance. You won’t just be looking great and worrying less, you’ll be saving time, money, and energy over the long life of your Daily Grind shirts. And did we mention looking great? Oh. We did.

name: Summer Weight Jeans
short_description: A lighter stretch denim for warmer climates.
description: With its casual look and broken-in feel, denim has always been an old favorite. But it can be a little heavy for warmer weather. So what's the solution? Summer Weight Jeans. Everything you love about denim in a lighter weight to keep you cool.

name: Stretch Wool Dress Pants
short_description: Versatile four-season wool pants with a hint of stretch.
description: What happens when first-class comfort meets a world-class fit? Something incredible. These versatile four-season wool pants have a hint of stretch for comfort while you move, and they're designed to bounce back from whatever comes your way. Whether it's a long flight overseas, or simply a busy week at the office, the Stretch Wool Dress Pant will always stay in top form. Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose dress pant that can recover and perform after just about anything.

name: Weekday Warrior Dress Pants
short_description: Wrinkle-resistant, easy-care cotton that simplifies your work day.
description: Let's be honest about this: nobody likes getting dressed for work. Picking out the pants, the unwelcome wrinkles, the clumsy ironing board—who needs it? Certainly not us. The solution, we would posit, is the Weekday Warriors. Made from non-iron fabric, available in a range of office-friendly colors, these great-fitting, hassle-free cotton dress pants take the pain out of workdays. So relax. Enjoy that coffee. Savor that sports page. And say goodbye to ironing forever.

name: Unconstructed Italian Wool Blazer
description: Head to a piazza in any major Italian city, and you’re likely to encounter “sprezzatura,” the art of effortless style. That same sense of casual elegance was the inspiration behind this season’s unconstructed blazers. Crafted from Italian fabrics, and featuring a more relaxed, “unconstructed” design, they’re the type of blazers you can throw on over anything for an instant dose of casual cool – which, we’ve been told, goes perfectly with a shot of espresso.

name: Italian Knit Blazer
description: We sourced knit cotton fabric from Italy to create a sharp and functional four-season blazer. It's unconstructed tailoring makes it perfect for spring and summer, but it still has enough weight and texture to work in the colder months as well. Wear it to work, or take it to Milan—it's your call.

name: Tuxedo Shirt
short_description: Luxe Italian fabric. Impeccable details. Cut to an elegant fit.
description: We've always felt that you shouldn't have to go to a tailor for a great dress shirt, and for us, the Americano is proof. The most luxurious dress shirt we offer, it starts with premium cotton fabric from one of Italy's most celebrated mills. We cut and stitch the cloth to a crisp, elegant fit, and finish it with mother-of-pearl-buttons, double knife pleats, and a split-back yoke. The Americano will pair wonderfully with your favorite suit and tie, but it can go just as well with a great pair of selvage denim or chinos.

name: Travel Jeans
short_description: Colorful denim with stretch & a natural resistance to wrinkles.
description: When you're traveling, bag space is at a premium. Which means you need a pair of pants that can handle anything. That's precisely why we created Travel Jeans. They have a hint of stretch for comfort, they're naturally resistant to wrinkles, and they can do pretty much anything chinos can. But, yes, they are still jeans for all those denim lovers out there.

name: The Blue Jean
short_description: Perfectly broken-in with a hint of stretch. Made for everyday wear.
description: We all have that favorite pair of jeans. That treasured, perfectly broken-in pair of denim that we wear a little more than we should. And that's exactly what we set out to recreate. Made from premium denim with a curved waistband and a hint of comfortable stretch, these aren't just a pair of blue jeans. They're THE Blue Jean, and once you put them on, you won't want to take them off anytime soon.

name: Washed Chinos
short_description: Our original better-fitting chinos in a range of colors.
description: The pants Bonobos was built on, we designed these chinos to fit great and to do it all. Their curved waistband conforms to the natural shape of your waist, and their trimmer cut makes for a more flattering silhouette. You can dress them up, you can dress them down, and damn, do they come in some amazing colors.

name: Capstone Italian Wool Tuxedo Pant
description: There's something to be said for a simple, classic suit. But there's something to be celebrated in a sartorial masterpiece. Crafted exclusively from the finest fabrics in the world, the Capstone is the pinnacle of the Bonobos tailored line, a showpiece suit designed for the connoisseur. Great structures—and great wardrobes—start with a strong foundation. But when you arrive at the summit, the Capstone brings everything together and makes it complete.

name: Capstone Italian Wool Tuxedo Jacket
description: There's something to be said for a simple, classic suit. But there's something to be celebrated in a sartorial masterpiece. Crafted exclusively from the finest fabrics in the world, the Capstone is the pinnacle of the Bonobos tailored line, a showpiece suit designed for the connoisseur. Great structures—and great wardrobes—start with a strong foundation. But when you arrive at the summit, the Capstone brings everything together and makes it complete.

name: Foundation Italian Wool Suit Pants
short_description: 100% Italian Marzotto wool in an all-season weight.
description: Finding a classic, expertly-made suit is tough—we know, we've been there. Which is exactly why we decided to make our Foundation suit. Crafted from world-class fabrics, and available in two impeccable fits, it is that dependable, great-fitting suit you can go back to again and again, whether it's for work, for play, or some stylish combination of the two. And don't be afraid to use the jacket and pants as separates—we do it all the time.

description: We all have that favorite pair of jeans. That treasured, perfectly broken-in pair of denim that we wear a little more than we should. And that's exactly what we set out to recreate. Made from premium denim with a curved waistband and a hint of comfortable stretch, these aren't just a pair of blue jeans. They're THE Blue Jean, and once you put them on, you won't want to take them off anytime soon.

name: Unconstructed Italian Wool Blazer
description: Head to a piazza in any major Italian city, and you’re likely to encounter “sprezzatura,” the art of effortless style. That same sense of casual elegance was the inspiration behind this season’s unconstructed blazers. Crafted from Italian fabrics, and featuring a more relaxed, “unconstructed” design, they’re the type of blazers you can throw on over anything for an instant dose of casual cool – which, we’ve been told, goes perfectly with a shot of espresso.

name: Foundation Chambray Suit Jacket
description: Finding a classic, expertly-made suit is tough—we know, we've been there. Which is exactly why we decided to make our Foundation suit. Crafted from world-class fabrics, and available in two impeccable fits, it is that dependable, great-fitting suit you can go back to again and again, whether it's for work, for play, or some stylish combination of the two. And don't be afraid to use the jacket and pants as separates—we do it all the time.

name: Jetsetter Stretch Wool Suit Pant
description: What happens when first-class comfort meets a world-class fit? Something incredible. Something we like to call "The Jetsetter." It's a versatile four-season wool suit with a hint of stretch, and a signature passport pocket inside the jacket. It will keep its razor-sharp silhouette whenever you need it, and bounce back from whatever comes your way. At this price, it is an ideal "first suit" for those just starting out, but it's equally appropriate for the experienced sartorialist. Whether it's a long flight overseas, or simply a busy week at the office, the Jetsetter will always stay in top form. Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose suit that can recover and perform after just about anything.

name: Daily Grind Wrinkle Free Dress Shirt
short_description: Soft, tailored cotton resistant to wrinkles & machine washable.
description: Dressing for work isn't rocket science. It's really about looking your best without spending a ton of time doing so. Which is why the Daily Grinds come in so handy. Simply stated, these dress shirts are crafted and tailored never to wrinkle. Utilizing wrinkle-free technology, they can be washed and worn with minimal ironing, and they will maintain their rich color and crisp appearance. You won’t just be looking great and worrying less, you’ll be saving time, money, and energy over the long life of your Daily Grind shirts. And did we mention looking great? Oh. We did.

name: Washed Chinos
short_description: Our original better-fitting chinos in a range of colors.
description: The pants Bonobos was built on, we designed these chinos to fit great and to do it all. Their curved waistband conforms to the natural shape of your waist, and their trimmer cut makes for a more flattering silhouette. You can dress them up, you can dress them down, and damn, do they come in some amazing colors.

name: Capstone Italian Wool Suit Jacket
description: There's something to be said for a simple, classic suit. But there's something to be celebrated in a sartorial masterpiece. Crafted exclusively from the finest fabrics in the world, the Capstone is the pinnacle of the Bonobos tailored line, a showpiece suit designed for the connoisseur. Great structures—and great wardrobes—start with a strong foundation. But when you arrive at the summit, the Capstone brings everything together and makes it complete.

name: Unconstructed Italian Wool Blazer
description: Head to a piazza in any major Italian city, and you’re likely to encounter “sprezzatura,” the art of effortless style. That same sense of casual elegance was the inspiration behind this season’s unconstructed blazers. Crafted from Italian fabrics, and featuring a more relaxed, “unconstructed” design, they’re the type of blazers you can throw on over anything for an instant dose of casual cool – which, we’ve been told, goes perfectly with a shot of espresso.

name: Summer Weight Shorts
short_description: The lightest version of our signature chino shorts.
description: Shorts are already missing their bottom half. How do you make them even more wearable in warm weather? On our end, we sourced some of the lightest, most comfortable cotton we could find. Wearing these lightweight wonders is the next best thing to wearing nothing at... well, let's just say they're really comfortable in the heat. They're great for vacations, superb for barbecues and ball games, and they do beach weekends like you wouldn't believe.

name: Tuxedo Shirt
short_description: Luxe Italian fabric. Impeccable details. Cut to an elegant fit.
description: We've always felt that you shouldn't have to go to a tailor for a great dress shirt, and for us, the Americano is proof. The most luxurious dress shirt we offer, it starts with premium cotton fabric from one of Italy's most celebrated mills. We cut and stitch the cloth to a crisp, elegant fit, and finish it with mother-of-pearl-buttons, double knife pleats, and a split-back yoke. The Americano will pair wonderfully with your favorite suit and tie, but it can go just as well with a great pair of selvage denim or chinos.

name: Daily Grind Wrinkle Free Dress Shirt
short_description: Soft, tailored cotton resistant to wrinkles & machine washable.
description: Dressing for work isn't rocket science. It's really about looking your best without spending a ton of time doing so. Which is why the Daily Grinds come in so handy. Simply stated, these dress shirts are crafted and tailored never to wrinkle. Utilizing wrinkle-free technology, they can be washed and worn with minimal ironing, and they will maintain their rich color and crisp appearance. You won’t just be looking great and worrying less, you’ll be saving time, money, and energy over the long life of your Daily Grind shirts. And did we mention looking great? Oh. We did.

name: Cotton Cashmere Half-Zip Sweater
short_description: Luxurious & breathable. A transitional, sophisticated pullover.
description: We're always on the lookout for that perfect transitional sweater to throw on when the weather gets cooler, and this just might be it. Cotton is famous for its softness and comfort. Cashmere is legendary for its luxurious hand-feel and warmth. And our Cotton Cashmere knits combine the very best of both. These are all-purpose garments that make seasonal layering easy. Weekends on the town, beachside getaways, long vacations to foreign locales – Bonobos Cotton Cashmere is the simple way to cover warmth and style.

name: Travel Jeans
short_description: Colorful denim with stretch & a natural resistance to wrinkles.
description: When you're traveling, bag space is at a premium. Which means you need a pair of pants that can handle anything. That's precisely why we created Travel Jeans. But, yes, they are still jeans for all those denim lovers out there.

short_description: Your everyday polo made from soft Peruvian piqué cotton.
description: A rule to live by: when the weather gets warm, a drawer of classic polo shirts is an absolute necessity. name: The Blue Jean
short_description: Perfectly broken-in with a hint of stretch. Made for everyday wear.
description: We all have that favorite pair of jeans. That treasured, perfectly broken-in pair of denim that we wear a little more than we should. And that's exactly what we set out to recreate. Made from premium denim with a curved waistband and a hint of comfortable stretch, these aren't just a pair of blue jeans. They're THE Blue Jean, and once you put them on, you won't want to take them off anytime soon.

name: Unconstructed Italian Wool Blazer
description: Head to a piazza in any major Italian city, and you’re likely to encounter “sprezzatura,” the art of effortless style. That same sense of casual elegance was the inspiration behind this season’s unconstructed blazers. Crafted from Italian fabrics, and featuring a more relaxed, “unconstructed” design, they’re the type of blazers you can throw on over anything for an instant dose of casual cool – which, we’ve been told, goes perfectly with a shot of espresso.

name: Tuxedo Shirt
short_description: Luxe Italian fabric. Impeccable details. Cut to an elegant fit.
description: We've always felt that you shouldn't have to go to a tailor for a great dress shirt, and for us, the Americano is proof. The most luxurious dress shirt we offer, it starts with premium cotton fabric from one of Italy's most celebrated mills. We cut and stitch the cloth to a crisp, elegant fit, and finish it with mother-of-pearl-buttons, double knife pleats, and a split-back yoke. The Americano will pair wonderfully with your favorite suit and tie, but it can go just as well with a great pair of selvage denim or chinos.

name: Jetsetter Stretch Wool Suit Jacket
description: What happens when first-class comfort meets a world-class fit? Something incredible. Something we like to call "The Jetsetter." It's a versatile four-season wool suit with a hint of stretch, and a signature passport pocket inside the jacket. It will keep its razor-sharp silhouette whenever you need it, and bounce back from whatever comes your way. At this price, it is an ideal "first suit" for those just starting out, but it's equally appropriate for the experienced sartorialist. Whether it's a long flight overseas, or simply a busy week at the office, the Jetsetter will always stay in top form. Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose suit that can recover and perform after just about anything.

name: Daily Grind Wrinkle Free Dress Shirt
short_description: Soft, tailored cotton resistant to wrinkles & machine washable.
description: Dressing for work isn't rocket science. It's really about looking your best without spending a ton of time doing so. Which is why the Daily Grinds come in so handy. Simply stated, these dress shirts are crafted and tailored never to wrinkle. Utilizing wrinkle-free technology, they can be washed and worn with minimal ironing, and they will maintain their rich color and crisp appearance. You won’t just be looking great and worrying less, you’ll be saving time, money, and energy over the long life of your Daily Grind shirts. And did we mention looking great? Oh. We did.

Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose suit that can recover and perform after just about anything.

name: Travel Jeans
short_description: Colorful denim with stretch & a natural resistance to wrinkles.
description: When you're traveling, bag space is at a premium. Which means you need a pair of pants that can handle anything. That's precisely why we created Travel Jeans. They have a hint of stretch for comfort, they're naturally resistant to wrinkles, and they can do pretty much anything chinos can. But, yes, they are still jeans for all those denim lovers out there.

name: The Blue Jean
short_description: Perfectly broken-in with a hint of stretch. Made for everyday wear.
description: We all have that favorite pair of jeans. That treasured, perfectly broken-in pair of denim that we wear a little more than we should. And that's exactly what we set out to recreate. Made from premium denim with a curved waistband and a hint of comfortable stretch, these aren't just a pair of blue jeans. They're THE Blue Jean, and once you put them on, you won't want to take them off anytime soon.

name: Weekday Warrior Dress Pants
short_description: Wrinkle-resistant, easy-care cotton that simplifies your work day.
description: Let's be honest about this: nobody likes getting dressed for work. Picking out the pants, the unwelcome wrinkles, the clumsy ironing board—who needs it? Certainly not us. The solution, we would posit, is the Weekday Warriors. Made from non-iron fabric, available in a range of office-friendly colors, these great-fitting, hassle-free cotton dress pants take the pain out of workdays. So relax. Enjoy that coffee. Savor that sports page. And say goodbye to ironing forever.

name: Foundation Italian Wool Suit Pants
short_description: 100% Italian Marzotto wool in an all-season weight.
description: Finding a classic, expertly-made suit is tough—we know, we've been there. Which is exactly why we decided to make our Foundation suit. Crafted from world-class fabrics, and available in two impeccable fits, it is that dependable, great-fitting suit you can go back to again and again, whether it's for work, for play, or some stylish combination of the two. And don't be afraid to use the jacket and pants as separates—we do it all the time.

name: Tuxedo Shirt
short_description: Luxe Italian fabric. Impeccable details. Cut to an elegant fit.
description: We've always felt that you shouldn't have to go to a tailor for a great dress shirt, and for us, the Americano is proof. The most luxurious dress shirt we offer, it starts with premium cotton fabric from one of Italy's most celebrated mills. We cut and stitch the cloth to a crisp, elegant fit, and finish it with mother-of-pearl-buttons, double knife pleats, and a split-back yoke. The Americano will pair wonderfully with your favorite suit and tie, but it can go just as well with a great pair of selvage denim or chinos.

description: Dressing for work isn't rocket science. It's really about looking your best without spending a ton of time doing so. Which is why the Daily Grinds come in so handy. Simply stated, these dress shirts are crafted and tailored never to wrinkle. Utilizing wrinkle-free technology, they can be washed and worn with minimal ironing, and they will maintain their rich color and crisp appearance. You won’t just be looking great and worrying less, you’ll be saving time, money, and energy over the long life of your Daily Grind shirts. And did we mention looking great? Oh. We did.

name: Travel Jeans
short_description: Colorful denim with stretch & a natural resistance to wrinkles.
description: When you're traveling, bag space is at a premium. Which means you need a pair of pants that can handle anything. That's precisely why we created Travel Jeans. They have a hint of stretch for comfort, they're naturally resistant to wrinkles, and they can do pretty much anything chinos can. But, yes, they are still jeans for all those denim lovers out there.

name: Unconstructed Italian Wool Blazer
description: Head to a piazza in any major Italian city, and you’re likely to encounter “sprezzatura,” the art of effortless style. That same sense of casual elegance was the inspiration behind this season’s unconstructed blazers. Crafted from Italian fabrics, and featuring a more relaxed, “unconstructed” design, they’re the type of blazers you can throw on over anything for an instant dose of casual cool – which, we’ve been told, goes perfectly with a shot of espresso.

name: Summer Weight Shorts
short_description: The lightest version of our signature chino shorts.
description: Shorts are already missing their bottom half. How do you make them even more wearable in warm weather? On our end, we sourced some of the lightest, most comfortable cotton we could find. Wearing these lightweight wonders is the next best thing to wearing nothing at... well, let's just say they're really comfortable in the heat. They're great for vacations, superb for barbecues and ball games, and they do beach weekends like you wouldn't believe.

name: Capstone Italian Wool Tuxedo Jacket
description: There's something to be said for a simple, classic suit. But there's something to be celebrated in a sartorial masterpiece. Crafted exclusively from the finest fabrics in the world, the Capstone is the pinnacle of the Bonobos tailored line, a showpiece suit designed for the connoisseur. Great structures—and great wardrobes—start with a strong foundation. But when you arrive at the summit, the Capstone brings everything together and makes it complete.

name: Classic Pique Polo
short_description: Your everyday polo made from soft Peruvian piqué cotton.
description: A rule to live by: when the weather gets warm, a drawer of classic polo shirts is an absolute necessity. They go with everything (think chinos, denim, even a sport coat) and they're designed to be breathable and cool. Our Classic Piqué Polo is made from some of the softest piqué cotton around, and it comes in every color you need.

description: Shorts are already missing their bottom half. How do you make them even more wearable in warm weather? On our end, we sourced some of the lightest, most comfortable cotton we could find. Wearing these lightweight wonders is the next best thing to wearing nothing at... well, let's just say they're really comfortable in the heat. They're great for vacations, superb for barbecues and ball games, and they do beach weekends like you wouldn't believe.

name: Capstone Italian Wool Tuxedo Jacket
description: There's something to be said for a simple, classic suit. But there's something to be celebrated in a sartorial masterpiece. Crafted exclusively from the finest fabrics in the world, the Capstone is the pinnacle of the Bonobos tailored line, a showpiece suit designed for the connoisseur. Great structures—and great wardrobes—start with a strong foundation. But when you arrive at the summit, the Capstone brings everything together and makes it complete.

name: Summer Weight Chinos
short_description: The lightest version of our signature chinos. Cool, breathable cotton.
description: Cool, crisp, and breathable in the heat, the Summer Weight Chinos bring a lighter fabric weight to your favorite class of pant. They can do everything our great-fitting Washed Chinos can do, but they do it . . . well, a little bit cooler. From May picnics to July barbecues to hot August nights at rooftop parties, these are the chinos you can wear starting the first sunny days of spring, right on through until Indian summer. Yep. Pretty cool.

name: Stretch Wool Dress Pants
short_description: Versatile four-season wool pants with a hint of stretch.
description: What happens when first-class comfort meets a world-class fit? Something incredible. These versatile four-season wool pants have a hint of stretch for comfort while you move, and they're designed to bounce back from whatever comes your way. Whether it's a long flight overseas, or simply a busy week at the office, the Stretch Wool Dress Pant will always stay in top form. Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose dress pant that can recover and perform after just about anything.

description: Dressing for work isn't rocket science. It's really about looking your best without spending a ton of time doing so. Which is why the Daily Grinds come in so handy. Simply stated, these dress shirts are crafted and tailored never to wrinkle. short_description: A lighter stretch denim for warmer climates.

name: Travel Jeans
short_description: Colorful denim with stretch & a natural resistance to wrinkles.
description: When you're traveling, bag space is at a premium. Which means you need a pair of pants that can handle anything. That's precisely why we created Travel Jeans. They have a hint of stretch for comfort, they're naturally resistant to wrinkles, and they can do pretty much anything chinos can. But, yes, they are still jeans for all those denim lovers out there.

name: The Blue Jean
short_description: Perfectly broken-in with a hint of stretch. Made for everyday wear.
description: We all have that favorite pair of jeans. That treasured, perfectly broken-in pair of denim that we wear a little more than we should. And that's exactly what we set out to recreate. Made from premium denim with a curved waistband and a hint of comfortable stretch, these aren't just a pair of blue jeans. They're THE Blue Jean, and once you put them on, you won't want to take them off anytime soon.

name: Jetsetter Stretch Wool Suit Jacket
description: What happens when first-class comfort meets a world-class fit? Something incredible. Something we like to call "The Jetsetter." It's a versatile four-season wool suit with a hint of stretch, and a signature passport pocket inside the jacket. It will keep its razor-sharp silhouette whenever you need it, and bounce back from whatever comes your way. At this price, it is an ideal "first suit" for those just starting out, but it's equally appropriate for the experienced sartorialist. Whether it's a long flight overseas, or simply a busy week at the office, the Jetsetter will always stay in top form. Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose suit that can recover and perform after just about anything.

description: With its casual look and broken-in feel, denim has always been an old favorite. But it can be a little heavy for warmer weather. So what's the solution? Summer Weight Jeans. Everything you love about denim in a lighter weight to keep you cool.

name: Stretch Wool Dress Pants
short_description: Versatile four-season wool pants with a hint of stretch.
description: What happens when first-class comfort meets a world-class fit? Something incredible. These versatile four-season wool pants have a hint of stretch for comfort while you move, and they're designed to bounce back from whatever comes your way. Whether it's a long flight overseas, or simply a busy week at the office, the Stretch Wool Dress Pant will always stay in top form. Simply put, it is a wardrobe essential—the versatile, all-purpose dress pant that can recover and perform after just about anything.
